lines.text: Rock rock! Rock rock!
She's calling a rock! We're doomed!
[Jean-Bob is trying to convince the others he was turned into a prince]
Are you going to tell me you did not see me as a prince?

[taps forehead]
I think he's still got some damage in the attic.
I don't believe this. I was a prince!
Don't push your luck, Jean-Bob.
But-no- Hey, you out there! Quit smooching and tell me something. Did you or did you not see me as a prince in the mountain!
[everyone laughs]
This is not happening. It's a conspiracy. I was a prince, I tell you! A prince!
Whatever it is you have planned, you'll never get away with it, because you are a bad person, and bad people stand no chance against good people, like my son Prince Derek.
[Clavius sighs]
Did you parents ignore you as a child? Oh tell Queen Unberta, what dark secret lurks within that dark twisted mind of yours? Come on, out with it!

[exasperated]
Don't you ever shut up?

[walking into Uberta's cell, which Knuckles is redecorating]
What is this?
If I'm going to spend my birthday here, everything must be perfect!
Oh you're driving me nuts with this birthday thing!
[he pulls Knuckles away]
Let go of my servant!
[she grabs Knuckles and they fight over him]
Your servant? I taught him everything he knows! And furthermore, this ain't your castle Lady! Let go!
Lady? Your Highness is the proper way for one of your class to address one of mine!
Ow! Not so hard!
[he and Clavius fall out of the cell and Clavius shuts the door]
Don't hurt him! He hasn't finished my cake!
Oh... you are a hostage!
Too bad you couldn't live to see this day, o partner of mine.
[he throws a dagger at Rothbart's portrait]
We could have shared it all, but no, you had to betray me! We conquered the Forbidden Arts together, but then you drove me underground.
[he spits a pin at Rothbart's portrait]
Thought you were real smart didn't you? Until you met... Prince Derek!
[he throws an axe at Rothbart's portrait]
But today, today Derek his match... me! Hahaha! And now that he's out of the way, I'm gonna go back to our old castle and get the Forbidden Arts, proving that I... was always... the greater man!
[he exclaims, throwing a dart at Rothbart's portrait]
